Description:
PPF installer is expected to perform quality work without direct or continual supervision and be able and willing to work on all work assigned to him/her.
Follow Company safety procedures to avoid exposure to fumes, dirt, dust, harsh chemicals.
Ability to operate computer, and plotter system for tint/PPF products, (not a requirement but preferred.
The Paint Protection Film Installer is responsible for the installation of paint protection product on customer vehicles, from start to finish.
Review the quality of the finished product and make alterations as necessary.
Disseminate or explain information regarding products to customers, take orders, and address complaints as applicable.Skills
Skills:
Excellent attention to detail and manual dexterity.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
Support the efforts of our current team of installers
Willingness to learn processes and procedures
Must show attention to detail to deliver a consistent high quality finished installation.
Must have excellent eye-hand coordination and dexterity.
Must possess a keen attention to detail.

Data.Company Industry: Automotive Repair, Spare Parts, & Support Services
